DOC.brief_summary: A retrospective study use data base anonymized medical record . The purpose study examine different therapeutic strategy management patient major depressive disorder ( MDD ) suboptimal response antidepressant drug primary care
DOC.brief_title: Badalona Major Depressive Disorder Database Study
DOC.detailed_description: Therapeutic strategy management patient major depressive disorder ( MDD ) suboptimal response antidepressant drug primary care : Badalona database study
DOC.criteria: An International Classification Primary Care ( ICPC2 ) DSMIVTR diagnosis major depressive disorder ( MDD ) At least 8 week antidepressant treatment identification period 01 January 2008 31 December 2009 18 month enrollment medical pharmacy record index episode date
